name: Tourism Victory
victoryString: You won by overwhelming the world with your tourism and culture!
defeatString: Another civ dominated the world's culture and tourism.
Milestones: Have TourismInfluence >= 1.0 against each civ AND Era >= Industrial AND TotalTourism >= 150

civilopediaText.text: Win by converting other civilizations culturally: your total tourism relative to their culture must reach dominance.
